title: Blog articles on various financial services
snippet:
We are looking for a quick delivery of 5 seo optimized blog articles 600 words each on the following topics:

- Debt Collection Services
- Credit Management
- Debt purchase & factoring
- Credit Risk Management
- Asset Liquidation

All articles need to be optimized around the keyword "CLB Solutions". 

Need the articles to be completed in 1 day :)
